posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade in order to complete my T206 NY Highlanders subset.

The following are my needs:

  Cree, Birdie  Follow Thru
  Elberfeld, Kid  Portrait
  Engle, Clyde  Batting
  Frill, John  Follow Thru
  Hemphill, Charlie  Fielding
  Keeler, Willie  Batting
  Kleinow, Red  Catching
  Knight, Jack  Batting
  Manning, Rube  Pitching
  Quinn, Jack  Follow Thru
  Warhop, Jack  Batting

My first priority on the list would be Keeler Batting.  My requirements are that the cards be SGC or raw.  I also want them to be presentable with no paper loss or holes.  Grades are what they are (no authentics).

For trade, I have the following link:

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Cooper1927/for-saletrade[/url]

I would also be interested in other NY Highlander type cards (E103-Chase, E93, E98, T215, M116, etc.)

You may email me at [url]cooper1927@yahoo.com[/url], or PM me.

Thank you.
